name: Cozy log cabin in the woods on a rainy day with nothing to do but play Connect 4 by yourself simulator.
name_original: Cozy log cabin in the woods on a rainy day with nothing to do but play Connect 4 by yourself simulator.
description:
This is my first game in Unity written in C#.  All images from unsplash.com.

This is just a simple relaxed game of connect four on a rainy day kind of thing.
